cab.content: Circulated by the Secretary of State for India. Following telegram despatched to-day to M. Hymans : " Your telegram of 26th November. Armenia. Indian Government associate themselves with reply already returned by His Majesty s Government. EdwinMontagu, Secretary of State for India," Please inform Mr. Balfour,2939-2 100 12.20felegram from Secretary of State for India to Sir W. Meyer, Geneva, dated 10th December 1920.
